title: run pytorch using GPU on windows
body_html:
Hello,
I am using windows 10 and I have pytorch installed and I have a GPU
when running a pytorch script, it uses by default the CPU, not the GPU, and accordingly, I have cuda runtime error: out of memory
How can I force the script to uses GPU not the CPU ?

In lunix platform, I usually write CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=x but that is not possible on windows

any idea ?

How can I force the script to uses GPU not the CPU ?

any idea ?
